title: 谁能帮我制作一个西瓜男的皮肤？
author: 丿火麒麟灬LONG
txt_content: 请大神帮我制作。http://image.baidu.com/i?ct=503316480&z=&tn=baiduimagedetail&ipn=d&word=%E8%A5%BF%E7%93%9C%E7%9D%A1%E8%A1%A3%E7%94%B7&step_word=&ie=utf-8&in=25383&cl=2&lm=-1&st=&cs=346036046,1592784341&os=369034720,3251328038&pn=0&rn=1&di=43205868200&ln=1984&fr=&&fmq=1406368625939_R&ic=&s=&se=&sme=0&tab=&width=&height=&face=&is=&istype=&ist=&jit=&objurl=http%3A%2F%2Fd04.res.meilishuo.net%2Fpic%2Fl%2Fc6%2F88%2F23938e6a8d9fb647425bf4603b11_700_700.c6.jpeg#pn0&-1&di43205868200&objURLhttp%3A%2F%2Fd04.res.meilishuo.net%2Fpic%2Fl%2Fc6%2F88%2F23938e6a8d9fb647425bf4603b11_700_700.c6.jpeg&fromURLippr_z2C%24qAzdH3FAzdH3Fooo_z%26e3B4jtstfi75_z%26e3Bv54AzdH3Ffiw6jAzdH3Fd8l0abln80&W450&H450&T10304&S88&TPjpeg是这个里的衣服，是男生的

replies.author: 乃戳
replies.txt_content: 看了网址后，整个人精神了有没有

replies.author: 丿火麒麟灬LONG
replies.txt_content:
乃戳 发表于 2014-7-26 20:53
看了网址后，整个人精神了有没有
额.....那你会制作这个的皮肤吗？

replies.author: 许博仑
replies.txt_content: 我会，等我回家后我就做

replies.author: 丿火麒麟灬LONG
replies.txt_content:
许博仑 发表于 2014-8-1 13:23
我会，等我回家后我就做
那好，谢谢啦

replies.author: 许博仑
replies.txt_content: 能直接给张图吗？我好不容易有时间帮你做皮肤，可是看不到图
